text: Yeah, sure. Personal experimentation, and things I've read about attempting to extract semantic meaning from legal texts (which aren't regular prose). I have been able to extract predicates from a paragraph of law, for example, but trying to extract logical expressions that model more than extremely simple statements in a FOL-like way has been frustrating.
